Lāču muzejs

Bakery "Lāči" , founded by Normunds Skauģis, is very a good place to stop on the way to the university or home to buy freshly baked bread or drink coffee in a café in the bakery area. The bakery is open since 1993 and has been making everyone happy for almost 30 years with the legendary Latvian rye bread.
